product_name: CatEye CC-MC200W Micro Wireless Comp Bike Computer
long_description: This small and mighty CatEye CC-MC200W Micro Wireless Comp bike computer allows you to select the functions you want on your display, so what matters to you most remains in full view. Functions cover current, average and maximum speed, trip distance, odometer, elapsed time, stop watch, clock and dual tire size recognition. Additional features include backlight, average speed pacing, automatic start/stop, automatic power-saving mode and sleep mode. Large font size makes it easy to read trip details with a quick glance. FlexTight(TM) head unit bracket mounts quickly and securely, and without tools to a handlebar or stem measuring 22 - 32mm in diameter. Wireless transmission distance up to 27 in. CatEye CC-MC200W Micro Wireless Comp bike computer comes with 2 CR2032 batteries, 1 each for head unit and sensor.
short_description: This small and mighty CatEye CC-MC200W Micro Wireless Comp bike computer allows you to select the functions you want on your display, so what matters to you most remains in full view.
